verses.name: Psalms 23:1
verses.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

verses.name: Psalms 23:2
verses.text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

verses.name: Psalms 23:3
verses.text: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.

verses.name: Psalms 23:4
verses.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

verses.name: Psalms 23:5
verses.text: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
